delete.description:
删除指定的缓存实例,释放该实例的所有资源。

> 如果是删除按需资源,请按照本章节执行;如果是删除包周期资源,即退订,请参考[退订包周期资源](https://support.huaweicloud.com/api-oce/zh-cn_topic_0082522030.html#section2)。
delete.x-response-examples:
["{
  "results" : [ {
    "result" : "success",
 "instance" : "ef9633d9-0093-4bf4-8d3a-f2772f2fc89d"
  } ],
 "httpcode" : 200,
  "header" : {
    "Server" : "Web Server",
    "X-Content-Type-Options" : "nosniff",
 "Connection" : "keep-alive",
    "X-Download-Options" : "noopen",
    "Date" : "Fri, 01 Dec 2017 00:32:52 GMT",
 "Accept-Ranges" : "bytes",
    "X-Frame-Options" : "SAMEORIGIN",
    "Strict-Transport-Security" : "max-age=31536000; includeSubdomains;",
    "Cache-Control" : "private",
    "Expires" : "Thu, 01 Jan 1970 08:00:00 CST",
    "Content-Length" : "84",
    "X-XSS-Protection" : "1; mode=block;",
    "Content-Type" : "application/json"
 }
}"]
